action_description: This action will prevent Netro devices from watering in the next few days.
This action will water your yard for a period of time.  You can specify one zone or all zones, watering duration and start time.
This action will set the moisture level of a zone. It overrides the default moisture level provided by Netro cloud or Whisperer sensor.
provide your specific weather data to override Netro's default weather data
This action will stop the watering schedules generated by the "water" action.
This action will enable or disable your Netro devices.
